name: La folie de l'or
overview: The Folly of Gold. Looks like someone's attempt at making a H.E.R.O clone in BASIC. Equipped with a dorsal helicopter and a frontal laser, go to the end of your madness in some sinister settings with bad company. Published in both Hebdogiciel Hors Serie N°2, and Hebdogiciel Software N°1
